_comment:
This JSON stores my timeline data, all with same format:
(academic_profile ->work_experience ->participations_achievements ->competitions_awards). Where available participations_achievements/competitions_awards populates under corresponding academic_profile/work_experience.

academic_profile/work_experience.end_date: Ending tarting date of this event, 2023-10, Present
academic_profile/work_experience.title: Title of the event, Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM), Penang
academic_profile/work_experience.heading: Small description of the event, CGPA: 3.78 | Bachelor of Computer Sciences (Intelligent Computing) with Honours

description.title: Highlighten title of description with a new line below, Core subjects:
description.content: Normal description text related to the description title, Machine Learning and Computational Intelligence, Programming Methodology and Data Structures, Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database Organisation & Design, Principles of Computer Networks and Information Security, Integrated Software Development Workshop.

points.title: Highlighten title of points form text, Key Highlights:
content: Normal points form text each seperate by ','
Managed logistics, including VIP coordination, reviewing event procedures and delivering presentations.
Designed student's handbook and recorded meeting minutes.
Utilized Microsoft Excel, SharePoint, Word, and PowerPoint for documentation and team coordination.

participations_achievements/competitions.start_date: Starting date of this event (fill this if event is within 1 month), 2022-07
participations_achievements/competitions.end_date: Ending tarting date of this event, 2023-05
participations_achievements/competitions.title: Title of the event, Peer Assistance Leader (PAL)
participations_achievements/competitions.heading: Not Available for participations_achievements/competitions_awards now

points.title: Highlighten title of points form text, Duties including:
content: Normal points form text each seperate by ','
Led a team of about 15 people across the academic year, coordinating tasks and ensuring cross-unit collaboration.
Supervised the progress and provided feedback to drive continuous improvement.

media.path: Auto Animation of all media (img/video), assets/(field_folder)/ExpImg.png

academic_profile.title: Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM), Penang
academic_profile.heading: CGPA: 3.78 | Third-Year Bachelor of Computer Sciences (Intelligent Computing) with Honours

description.title: Core subjects:
description.content: Machine Learning and Computational Intelligence, Computer Graphics and Visualisation, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Programming Methodology and Data Structures, Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database Organisation & Design.

description.title: Core subjects:
description.content: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Advanced Mathematics and Basic Programming

description.title: Core subjects:
description.content: Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Advanced and Basic Mathematics, History, English Language, Malay Language, Moral Education

points.title: Key Highlights:
content: Conducted feasibility studies to evaluate and propose optimal approaches for new feature implementations.
Gained exposure to Large Language Model (LLM)–based semantic search using vector embeddings, contributing to intelligent data retrieval capabilities.
Collaborated in an Agile development environment by delivering weekly progress updates
Prepared comprehensive technical documentation to support ongoing development and knowledge sharing.

description.content: Assisted the team in performing the following duties for events e.g. Undergraduate Graduation Ceremony, College Open Days, Students Exchange Programme:

points.title: Key Highlights:
content: Managed logistics, including VIP coordination, reviewing event procedures and delivering presentations.
Designed the student handbook and recorded meeting minutes.
Utilized Microsoft Excel, SharePoint, Word, and PowerPoint for documentation and team coordination.

points.title: Key Highlights:
content: Enhanced client satisfaction ratings by scheduling on-site service requests, managing show logistics and booth functionality need to meet demands.
Followed all policies, regulations, dress code and schedules.
Communicated with all team members to navigate job duties and complete tasks.
Loaded, unloaded and moved material to and from storage and production areas.

points.title: Duties including:
content: Led a team of about 15 people across the academic year, coordinating tasks and ensuring cross-unit collaboration.
Supervised the progress and provided feedback to drive continuous improvement.

participations_achievements.title: President of the History & Geography Club
President of the STEM Society (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics)

competitions_awards.title: Dean’s List Awards | Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM)
competitions_awards.heading: 4 times so far (and continuing!)

competitions_awards.title: Top 10 Finalist | National Varsity Hackathon 2025 (V HACK 2025)
Second-runner up | KMJ e-Quizzery Science Carnival
National Top 200 Finalist | National level IMU Virtual Science Discovery Challenge 2021 (SDC)
